name: University Parker Pen set
description: This parker pen set features 2 white barrelled pens with the UCLan logo on the side of the barrel and writes in black ink; one is a fountain pen and the other a ballpoint and comes in its own box.

name: University Pen
description: This silver pen features the UCLan logo on the side of the barrel and writes in black ink. This item comes in its own plastic case.

name: University Book Mark
description: This bookmark comes in black and red and features the UCLan logo embossed in silver, as well as the Foster Building Reception phone number.

name: Universitiy Card Case
description: This lovely card case comes in silver and features the UClan logo frosted on the top with a soft interior to protect your cards.

name: University Compact Mirror
description: This beautiful compact mirror comes in silver with the UCLan logo frosted on the lid; it comes in a lovely velvet drawstring bag.

name: University Letter Opener
description: This lovely letter opener comes in silver with the UCLan roses logo on the handle.

name: University Stick Pin
description: This lovely UCLan pin features the infamous UCLan roses on a gold coloured stick.

name: University Octagon Paperweight
description:
This beautiful octagon shaped glass paperweight features the UCLan logo frosted onto the front and comes in a lovely storage box lined with purple satin.
Be quick there are only 2 in stock, and would make a lovely gift for any desk or office.

name: University Wine Glass
description: This beautiful wine glass features the UCLan logo frosted onto the chalice of the glass.

name: University Certificate Tube
description: This certificate tube features the official UCLan crest and is a perfect gift for yourself or someone you know that has graduated. To keep the proof of all the hard work precious and safe for a long time.

name: University Cufflinks
description: These fabulous UCLan branded silver cufflinks come in a lovely handy box for storage and are part of our University branded range.

name: Graduation Bear
description: Have you recently graduated? Or know someone that has? This is the perfect graduation gift, a soft grey bear with a graduation cap, gown and scroll; with UCLan embroided on the gown! Don't miss out on this lovely graduation keepsake!

name: American Style Hood
description:
This item comes in 3 different colours; Royal Blue, Purple, Petrol Blue. With 'University of Central Lancashire' printed across the breast. With this item you recieve a free white t-shirt with a smaller version of the same logo in navy, on the left breast.

Please Note: The Petrol Blue hood is the one that looks grey in the photograph. It is noticable blue in person; we will upload another photograph soon to better distinguish the colour. 

If you wish to see any other colours in this item please do not hesitate to let us know via our facebook or twitter pages.

https://www.facebook.com/UCLanFactory

https://twitter.com/Factory_UCLan

name: American Style Sweatshirts
description:
This item is in four colours; red, black, charcoal grey and blue. With 'University of Central Lancashire' printed accross the breast. This item is fantastic for those akwkward inbetween temperatures; thin enough to fit underneath a coat/jacket but still thick enough to keep you warm.

The sizes in this item are generous so please bear this in mind when ordering online.

If you would like to see any variations with this item i.e. colour then please contact us via facebook and twitter.

https://twitter.com/Factory_UCLan

https://www.facebook.com/UCLanFactory

name: University Zip Hoodie
description:
This university zip hoodie comes in charcoal grey, with pockets and the UCLan logo embroided on the left breast, and printed on the back in silver. 

We only have a small number in stock but if you wish to see more like this then get in touch with us via our facebook and twitter pages to let us know!

https://twitter.com/Factory_UCLan

description:

name: Classic UCLan Red Hot Chilli Hoodie
description:
*NEW COLOUR*

The classic UCLan hooded top in our best selling design, an american styled UCLan logo. In a deep red with the design printed in navy on white.

Features:

Double faced hood 
Matching drawstring cords
A Large front pocket with small hidden opening for earphone cord feed
Hidden earphone loops 

Want to see this in a different colour? Check out our facebook page for your chance to vote on upcoming colours and designs...

www.facebook.com/UCLanFactory


Please note the sizing is in mens and runs a little small, we recommend buying a size larger than usual.

name: Chunky Zip
description:
Fairtrade fleece lined zip hood, comes in three colours; Dark Denim  Ivy Green &( Plum brand new in stock in store only)

  £35

options.name: Ivy Green Size: Extra Large sold out

name: Gilet
description:
Limited edition, fairtrade Charcoal coloured Gilet with Uclan logo in white - Plain hood for mens, Fur lined hood for women's.* 

On sale, were £40
now only £15!
 
*Please note that the women's Gilet's are a size smaller than labelled. I.e. a size 14 fits a size 12.

name: Graduation Hoods 2013
description: When they are gone, they're gone!!! Graduation Class of 2013 hoods, available in 3 colours, light grey, black and red. A classic hooded top made from super-soft cotton with the UCLan roses logo embroidered to front left hand side, and '2013' printed on the back. Double faced hood, matching drawstring cords with a large front pocket WITH a small hidden opening for earphone cord feed and hidden earphone loops. Don't miss out on getting your hands on a graduation hood!

name: Course Rep Hoodie 2013
description: Custom Course Rep Hoodie Please read before ordering - Stuff you need to know: • Please enter your name/nickname and course into the PayPal comments option after the checkout. These details will be printed in white on the right breast; your name/nickname will be above your course name. • These hoodies are made to order and can take up to 6-8 weeks from date of payment. We aim for as quick a turnaround as possible but please be patient - Orders are processed in batches of 24. The First Batch has now gone off to be processed!!! You will be notified via email when your hoodie has arrived, with the details of where you can pick it up. Please Note:The deadline for ordering the Second Batch of your course rep hood will be 31st January 2014 *These hoodies will need to be collected from the Opportunities Centre within 48 hours of notification of delivery*

name: Lagoon UltraSoft® Hoodie SALE
description:
Three brand new colours just in for 2012/13. You voted, we listened and here are three new options in our classic, american styled print. Our coziest hoodie yet, these are made from UltraSoft® cotton in
Peapod - soft limey green
Cerise - a fabulous hot pink and
Lagoon - pale turquoise blue

Heavyweight UltraSoft® Peach Finish Fabric
Double faced hood waffle lined in Orchid White
Flat chunky drawstring cords
Large Kangaroo pouch pocket WITH
Hidden phone/ipod pocket

name: Fairtrade Printed Cotton Tote Bag SALE
description:
100% Fairtrade

Un-bleached cotton tote bag with the (frankly fabulous) Factory logo printed in black.

Strong and lightweight, it's the perfect size to carry your sketchbooks and notepads.

name: Ltd Edition Zip Up Sweater
description:
This Limited Edition, bespoke track top is one of only 100 made so grab one whilst you can! 

Cozy fleece-lined sweater, in our most popular colour, with a stylish double zip and vertical UCLan print in lime green.

Features:
A double zipper down the front 
Shield design appliqued to the front
"1 of 100" tags
Zip-up pockets on both sides

Very Limited Edition and once they're gone we won't be getting any more. BUT, we will be bringing you brand new styles so don't fret. Check out our facebook page for your chance to vote on upcoming designs...

www.facebook.com/UCLanFactory

name: UCLan Crested USB Stick
description: A USB stick suitable for use on university and home computers. Flip top branded with the official UCLan logo.

name: Chalk Mug
